narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Tangelo - Intend Inc. is a Medical Foods Supplier provider based in Birmingham, MI. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $45.1M in Medicaid payments across 364K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $45.1M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
